# PROTECTED REGION ID(AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_CMAKELISTS_TXT_BEGIN) ENABLED START
set(AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR} CACHE STRING "" FORCE)

function (autoPnP_adv_capabilitiesView_before_use_callback)
	find_package(Qt4 REQUIRED)

	# Add some useful macros and variables
	# (QT_USE_FILE is a variable defined by find_package(Qt4) that contains a path to CMake script)
	include(${QT_USE_FILE})

	set(
		AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_QT_RCS
	)

	set(
		AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_QT_UIS
		"${AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_DIR}/ui/capabilitiesWindow.ui"
	)

	# Run rcc on all files from RCS
	qt4_add_resources(AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_QT_RC_SRCS ${AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_QT_RCS})
	set(AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_QT_RC_SRCS ${AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_QT_RC_SRCS} CACHE STRING "" FORCE)

	# Run uic on .ui files
	qt4_wrap_ui(AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_QT_UI_HDRS ${AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_QT_UIS})
	set(AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_QT_UI_HDRS ${AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_QT_UI_HDRS} CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
endfunction (autoPnP_adv_capabilitiesView_before_use_callback)

function (autoPnP_adv_capabilitiesView_after_use_callback)
    find_package(Qt4 REQUIRED)

    # Add some useful macros and variables
    # (QT_USE_FILE is a variable defined by find_package(Qt4) that contains a path to CMake script)
    include(${QT_USE_FILE})

    set_target_properties(autoPnP_adv_capabilitiesView PROPERTIES AUTOMOC TRUE)
endfunction (autoPnP_adv_capabilitiesView_after_use_callback)
# PROTECTED REGION END

xme_add_component (
    "autoPnP_adv_capabilitiesView"
    HEADERS
        "include/capabilitiesViewComponentWrapper.h"
        "include/capabilitiesViewComponent.h"
        "include/addComponentFunctionWrapper.h"
        "include/addComponentFunction.h"
        "include/removeComponentFunctionWrapper.h"
        "include/removeComponentFunction.h"
        "include/capabilitiesViewManifest.h"
    SOURCES
        "src/capabilitiesViewComponentWrapper.c"
        "src/capabilitiesViewComponent.cpp"
        "src/addComponentFunctionWrapper.cpp"
        "src/addComponentFunction.cpp"
        "src/removeComponentFunctionWrapper.cpp"
        "src/removeComponentFunction.cpp"
        "src/capabilitiesViewManifest.cpp"
    DEPENDS
        xme_core_directory_attribute
        xme_hal_qt
        xme_hal_safeString
        xme_hal_sched
        xme_hal_table
        xme_hal_time
    # PROTECTED REGION ID(AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_CMAKELISTS_TXT_XMEADDCOMPONENT) ENABLED START
	HEADERS
		"include/capabilitiesWindow.h"
		${AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_QT_UI_HDRS}
	SOURCES
		"src/capabilitiesWindow.cpp"
		${AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_QT_RC_SRCS}
	DEPENDS
		xme_hal_graphviz
	CALLBACK
		BEFORE_USE autoPnP_adv_capabilitiesView_before_use_callback
		AFTER_USE autoPnP_adv_capabilitiesView_after_use_callback
	#PROPERTIES "COMPILE_FLAGS" "/EHsc"
    # PROTECTED REGION END
)

# PROTECTED REGION ID(AUTOPNP_ADV_CAPABILITIESVIEW_CMAKELISTS_TXT_END) ENABLED START
# PROTECTED REGION END
